titleStmt.title: A proclamation, for raising pioniers, and providing baggage-horses to the army.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to the King and Queens most excellent Majesties,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the third day of June, 1690. And of Our Reign, the second year.
Signed: Da. Moncreiff, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
